text:
Enjoy a Festive Family Weekend in Boston This December with the Teddy Bear Tea Stay Package At Four Seasons Hotel Boston Published on : Friday, September 25, 2015
This December, Four Seasons Hotel Boston introduces an exclusive festive season experience for families: theTeddy Bear Tea weekend stay package. A perfect family weekend getaway, the package features luxurious accommodations and exclusive guest-only access to weekend reservations for Teddy Bear Tea – one of Boston’s most beloved holiday traditions – which sold out again this year, in record time.
“While a limited number of weekday reservations for Teddy Bear Tea are still available, we once again sold out of weekend dates within hours of opening reservations,” says Ryan Jimenez, Director of Public Relations atFour Seasons Hotel Boston. “This exclusive stay package is a special second opportunity for guests to obtain a weekend reservation for Teddy Bear Tea, which also makes for a perfect family weekend getaway in the city.”
Designed especially for families, the Teddy Bear Tea weekend stay package includes:
Tickets for two adults and one child to a weekend Teddy Bear Tea Special welcome amenity Luxurious accommodations
For guests booking this package, additional weekend tickets to Teddy Bear Tea in The Bristol can be purchased at USD 80.75 for adults and USD 31 for children, subject to availability.
Since its inception more than two decades ago, Teddy Bear Tea has become a popular New England event series, featuring a festive afternoon tea at Bristol Restaurant and Bar accompanied by a reading of a holiday children’s book by a Boston celebrity. Running December 1 through December 23, 2015, Teddy Bear Tea is seated daily at 3:15 pm, and features a menu of delectable tea sandwiches and pastries prepared by Four Seasons chefs, and a delightful array of special holiday beverages and premium teas, served in the festive elegance of Bristol Restaurant and Bar overlooking the beautiful Boston Public Garden. Four Seasons furry resident Truffles the Bear makes a return appearance at this year’s series, delighting families and young guests.
Over its storied history, Teddy Bear Tea has hosted notable celebrity readers including Red Sox player David Ortiz, model Gisele Bündchen, Miss Massachusetts and many figures from Boston news media.
The Teddy Bear Tea weekend stay package is available December 4–20, 2015. This offer is available for Friday through Sunday arrivals only, and must be booked at least 72 hours in advance. Full payment is required at the time of booking.
